snippet: After horrifying reports of abuse, Gov. Andrew Cuomo has finally come up with a comprehensive plan to oversee New York’s facilities for the disabled.
abstract: Editorial scores horrifying record of abuse at homes for the disabled in New York State; endorses plan by Gov Andrew Cuomo to strictly monitor such institutions and to expand criminal penalties for those who commit abuse.
lead_paragraph: After horrifying reports of abuse, Gov. Andrew Cuomo has finally come up with a comprehensive plan to oversee New York’s facilities for the disabled.
